description:
Like the name suggests, these strong, grippy patches hand handle heavy-duty repairs. Ideal for mending silicone-treated fabrics found on tents, tarps, stuff sacks, and more.

  • 40-denier siliconized ripstop nylon is clear to match fabric
  • Tape is waterproof, weatherproof, durable and machine washable
  • Adheres to almost anything but doesn't leave a sticky residue when removed
  • Contains 2 patches on a grid marked backer for custom shapes
name: Gear Aid Tenacious Tape Silnylon Patches
